line_2: But now prevailing o'er the hubbub wild,

line_2: Ye groves, along whose windings wild

line_1: When up to heav'n his thoughts he pil'd,
line_2: From fervent lips fair Michal smil'd,

line_1: Of hostile kindred upon kindred pil'd,

line_1: Let me where yon tall cliffs are rudely pil'd,

line_1: But Sands abrupt on Sands lay loosely pil'd,
